get.summary: Validate Innovatrics license

post.summary: Create or replace WlItem with provided data in payload.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description:
JSON with WatchlistItem ExternalId (if item does not exist then it will be created),
ImageData with base64 encoded images of single face with MIME type,
Watchlist ExternalIds which will be linked to WatchlistItem (if watchlists do not exists then they will be created with default threshold).

400.description: Exactly one face expected on single photo

post.summary: Creates copy of Face entity by FaceId and this Face will be linked to WatchlistItem by WatchlistItemId.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: JSON with FaceId and WatchlistItemId.

204.description: Creates copy of Face entity by FaceId and this Face will be linked to WatchlistItem by WatchlistItemId.

400.description: FaceId is already linked to WlItem.

404.description: FaceId or WatchlistItemId does not exists.

409.description: Face is not extracted yet or some blob data is missing.

post.summary: Remove Face from WatchlistItem specified by FaceId and WatchlistItemId.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: JSON with FaceId and WatchlistItemId.

204.description: Remove Face from WatchlistItem specified by FaceId and WatchlistItemId.

400.description: Face with is not linked to WlItem.

404.description: FaceId or WatchlistItemId does not exists.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: JSON with image data and search parameters

400.description: At least one face expected on a photo

get.summary: Gets list of all Cameras present on the server.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands related entities inline.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filters the results, based on a Boolean condition.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Selects which properties to include in the response.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Sorts the results.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Returns only the first n results.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Skips the first n results.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Includes a count of the matching results in the response.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: The entity to post

get.summary: Gets the specified Configuration by compound key.
get.description: Both [name] and [context] parameters must be quoted with single quotes('') because they are string values !

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of requested Configuration.

parameters.name: Context
parameters.description: Context of requested configuration.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands related entities inline.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Selects which properties to include in the response.

get.summary: Gets the Configuration values.
get.description: Transforms XML Configuration string into JSON array of objects that consists from PropertyName and PropertyValue.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Name of requested Configuration.

parameters.name: Context
parameters.description: Context of requested configuration.

post.summary: Creates new Configuration with default values.
post.description: Creates new Configuration XML record by provided Context and Name with default values.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: JSON with Name and Context of Configuration that will be created.

post.description: Creates new Configuration from valid XML string with provided Name and Context.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: JSON with Name, Context and Config as XML string of Configuration that will be created.

post.description: Deletes Configuration with provided Name and Context.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: JSON with Name and Context of Configuration that will be deleted.

post.description: Updates value of Property of Configuration with provided Name and Context with provided Value. Note that Value parameter can be of any data type, not only string !

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: JSON with Name, Context, Property and Value of Configuration property that will be updated.

400.description: Configuration property name or value is invalid.

post.description: Update multiple configuration properties in one call. Note that Value parameter can be of any data type, not only string !

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: JSON object with array of [Name, Context, Property, Value] objects that will be updated.

400.description: Configuration property name or value is invalid.

get.summary: Gets the specified Worker.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Id of Worker that was requested.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands related entities inline.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Selects which properties to include in the response.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: Id of Worker that will be deleted.

post.description: Creates new Worker of requested Type with default Configuration. Note that created Worker is not enabled after this call. You can modify its Configuration and then enable it by calling Action.EnableWorker.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: JSON with WorkerType of a newly created Worker.

400.description: If worker is not creatable or WorkerType is invalid.

post.description: This will enable the specified Worker. That means that new Worker thread will be created and started in appropriate Service.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: JSON with Id of a Worker that will be enabled.

post.description: This will disable the specified Worker. That means that Worker thread will be stopped and deleted in appropriate Service.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: JSON with Id of a Worker that will be disabled.

AddExistingFaceToWlItemData.description: Data required for adding cloned face to WatchlistItem.

WatchlistItemId.description: WatchlistItem Id that cloned face will be linked to.

RemoveExistingFaceFromWlItemData.description: Data required for removing face from WatchlistItem.

WatchlistItemId.description: WatchlistItem Id that face should be removed from.

StreamSourceData.description: Camera data required for camera creation.

Enable.description: Value indicating whether this Camera workers should be enabled after creation.

UpdateConfigValueData.description: Wrapper class for updating of configuration property.

PhotoData.description: Model of photo with data in it

BulkResponseData.description: Response data model for bulk operations.

Id.description: Id of not deleted photo, in case of error.

OpResult.description: Reason why photo with Id could not be deleted.

DatabaseVersion.description: Gets or sets the database version.

DatabaseVersionCreationTime.description: Gets or sets the database version creation time.

DatabaseVersionUpdatedTime.description: Gets or sets the database version updated time.

AssemblyVersion.description: Gets or sets the assembly version.

AssemblyLastModifiedTime.description: Gets or sets the assembly last modified time.

ScopeId.description: Gets or sets the scope identifier.

NumNewPhotos.description: Gets or sets the number new photos.

NumUnprocPhotos.description: Gets or sets the number unproc photos.

Status.description: Gets or sets the grouping status.

WatchlistItemCreateData.description: Model for creation of new WlItem.

DisplayName.description: Gets or sets the display name.

FullName.description: Gets or sets the full name.

ExternalId.description: Gets or sets the external identifier.

WatchlistData.description: Model for creation of new Watchlist.

ExternalId.description: Gets or sets the external identifier.
